rules_text:
Flying, first strike
[i]Aptitude[/i] – Whenever Est, Carefree Youngest Sister attacks, if you attacked with a Noble this combat, put a +1/+1 counter onto Est and draw a card.
[i]Sisterhood[/i] – If you control a creature named Palla and a creature named Catria, Pegasi you control have haste and mentor.
